Collagen Protein Bites

Nut-free, keto-friendly collagen protein balls with low Omega-6 content.

    Collagen Protein Bites

    Nut-free, keto-friendly collagen protein balls with low Omega-6 content.

    Ingredients

    • 2 scoops collagen peptides
    • 2–3 tbsp coconut flour
    • 2 tbsp coconut oil or cocoa butter, melted
    • 1–2 tbsp unsweetened cocoa powder
    • Swerve (or MonkFruit or erythritol), to taste
    • Dash of vanilla extract
    • Pinch of sea salt

    Instructions

    1. Combine dry ingredients.
    2. Stir in melted oil until dough forms.
    3. Adjust texture if needed.
    4. Roll into balls.
    5. Chill for at least 30 minutes.

    Nutrition Info

    • Servings: 18 balls
